1572617199_16nArdxrSaNThNp83kL8E6NLL9WD9.body: Today, a new law has just begun to take effect. DPI equipment is not yet installed everywhere. By 2021, it is planned to install the equipment in the right places. Just in time for the parliamentary elections. There are no technical inconveniences yet, but everyone should think about providing themselves with independent means of communication.

Today, a new law has just begun to take effect. DPI equipment is not yet installed everywhere. By 2021, it is planned to install the equipment in the right places. Just in time for the parliamentary elections. There are no technical inconveniences yet, but everyone should think about providing themselves with independent means of communication.
